subject: Hello
body:
Hello
I am Staff Sgt.Joyce Scranton, an American soldier serving in the US
military. I have some amount that I want to move out of ( SYRIA )
which might require your assistance urgently, Can I trust you? email
me now, for details as this mail was sent from a discreet email
account. Reach me on this
I wait your response
Sgt. Joyce Scranton

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Sgt. Joyce Scranton,

It's a pleasure to hear from you! I'm always eager to help, especially when it comes to supporting our military personnel. Could you please provide more details about the situation? I'd like to understand better how I might be able to assist.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Marie

How are you and your family?

Thanks for your prompt response. I appreciate the fact that we are
strangers for now but knowing that all relationship starts from strangers
to friendship and family in a moment of trust and sincerity so please note
that trust is very essential in all dealings. My name is Sgt  Joyce
Scranton, an American soldier serving in the US military in Camp Stanley
Damascus Syria.  Camp Stanley is one of the military bases run by the
United States of America in Syria. It is located close to Damascus and is
considered to be the largest part of the Red Cloud Garrison. It is located
relatively close to the DMZ ( Damascus syria Zone) and aims to ensure the
peace in the area. The history of this military base is not very rich,
although old enough. I must thank you for your response once again as this
shows your interest and I appreciate that.

In the past years there has been severe Wars/rainfall that caused deadly
flooding and damage to syria.. Some wealthy people including politicians
were killed and their houses and companies were destroyed as a result of
the severe floods/War. Majority of them lost their entire family as a
result of this and a great sum of United States currencies were realized by
the Government in their business structures, that is houses that were
destroyed but mostly companies.

During a routine patrol by my unit sometime ago, some of us discovered a
huge safe buried in a destroyed building. Most of the soldiers in my unit
were not aware of this as we kept it secret till we had time to personally
inspect the safe and found out it contained the sum of  $6 Million. This
politicians understood the laws against such amount of currency in the
country so I believed they buried it and secretly used it for their
political mischief. Three of us who found it decided to split it amongst
ourselves and at the moment, I have my share of $2 Million privately
secured and safe in two trunk boxes without the awareness of anyone but I
cannot continue to hold it back here for long because of my active duty.

I have a very good, trusted and reliable diplomat who can deliver the boxes
to you as he will be leaving syria. very soon and since he has diplomatic
immunity, the consignment will not be subject to rigorous screening. I will
provide you with the name of the diplomat in charge of delivery and I will
also give him your contact information that you will provide me to enable
him contact you immediately upon his arrival. In order to ship the baggage
which contains the money, I can make arrangement in sending it to any
address of your choice. The baggage will be tagged diplomatic documents and
ancient graphic art material so that the diplomat will not know the
contents of the boxes. I have decided to send it through diplomatic means
as I do not want this going through banks around here since it will not be
safe for us.

I am so sorry to encroach into your privacy in this manner but I got your
email address from an address journal and I found it pleasurable to contact
you On the Web for help. I am looking for a trust worthy person I can
entrust this funds to until I get back from my station in Damascus syria.

My late husband (Jonathan Scranton) would have taken responsibility of this
package but I lost him to Fort Hood shooting in 2017. I feel so bad when I
remember his death. His painful death made me to join the US Army. It is so
painful to remember that I lost him on that faithful day. Right now I am
determined to fight terrorism with all my strenght. I want to have a very
peaceful retirement, maybe get married again.

I am sure you will know the best way to handle such an amount of money for
us when it gets to you. I only need your trust, I will start making
arrangements to ship them at once. If we are lucky and fast enough, we can
conclude this within the next few days.

I will send the whole amount since I cannot keep any on me but can I trust
you? As I already informed you that this is of mutual benefit so once it
gets to you, you are to take 30 percent of the total sum for yourself, keep
60 percent  for me and donate the remaining 10 percent to any charity
organization so that our good Lord will assist and bless us in future.  I
believe this is fair enough.

Please I would like to know a little bit more about you like what you do
for a living, if you are married and so on because it is important that I
know in totality the personality upon whom I transact this deal with. You
should understand my fears here as this involves a large sum of cash.  We
need to build trust.

I want you to know that the knowledge of this money leaving the province of
to any safe location is just between the two of us so please endeavor to
keep it this way. If you are not capable of handling this huge sum then
please do not allow me ship them to you. I can find other means of dealing
with it as I have done everything possible to make this a reality from this
end. We must keep a low profile as a result of the amount in question and
please do not let me down.

Keep in mind at all time the need for confidentiality and absolute secrecy
until we conclude this deal. Phone conversation is not a safe measure in
this endeavor besides I cannot call you on the phone or receive fax for I
am not always at base as a result of my operational schedule and active
duty. Hope you are okay with this? Everything must be done by email so I
will like to know if you are still willing to help as I need your urgent
reply to this regard.

If you are not interested then please kindly delete this mail and do not
respond again rather than giving me false hope. Upon receipt of your email.

I cannot be seen with any sum above 100 USD around here, as it is not
allowed or make transfers on this course (it will be a serious risk on my
side and bring about awareness on our monitoring team). Though shipment of
such with diplomatic immunity is very expensive here. I will deduct
whatever is the shipping cost from the total fund to enable me pay for the
cost of sending it across to you.

CONFIDENTIALITY

Note that the diplomat will not be aware of the content of the boxes so
please do not tell him that they contain money. The boxes are packaged in a
consignment as art works and artifacts. Just let him know they belongs to a
dead soldier is who is related to you.  I shall send you the pictures of
myself and the consignments before handling over to the courier.

Can you handle this? Get back to me ASAP If you're interested in doing this
for me, so I can let you know how it will work.

God bless you and God bless America. Have a wonderful day.

I await your response ASAP.
Thanks
Joyce Scranton,

subject: Hi Marie,
body:
How are you doing?. I didn't hear from you again. Please reply my mail.
Thank you and stay safe.
Joyce Scranton,

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Marie,

How are you doing?. I didn't hear from you again. Please reply my mail.
Thank you and stay safe.
Joyce Scranton,
